```python
N, K = map(int, input().split())
R, S, P = map(int, input().split())
T = input()
SC = 0

def MaxScore(n, t):
    SC = 0
    if t[0] == 'r':
        SC += P
    elif t[0] == 's':
        SC += R
    else:
        SC += S
    NC = 1
    for i in range(1, n):
        if t[i] == 'r':
            if t[i] != t[i-1]:
                SC += P
                NC = 1
            elif t[i] == t[i-1] and NC % 2 == 0:
                SC += P
                NC += 1
            else:
                NC += 1
        elif t[i] == 's':
            if t[i] != t[i-1]:
                SC += R
                NC = 1
            elif t[i] == t[i-1] and NC % 2 == 0:
                SC += R
                NC += 1
            else:
                NC += 1
        else:
            if t[i] != t[i-1]:
                SC += S
                NC = 1
            elif t[i] == t[i-1] and NC % 2 == 0:
                SC += S
                NC += 1
            else:
                NC += 1
    return SC

for i in range(K):
    Ti = [T[j] for j in range(N) if j % K == i]
    Ti = ''.join(Ti)
    if (N - i) % K == 0:
        Ni = (N - i) // K
    else:
        Ni = (N - i) // K + 1
    SCi = MaxScore(Ni, Ti)
    SC += SCi

print(SC)
```
